steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 30 minutes.
Fry onions until golden brown; keep half aside for layering.
Cook chicken with tomatoes and remaining spices until done.
Boil rice with salt and whole spices until 80% cooked; drain.
Layer rice and chicken in a pot with mint, coriander, and fried onions.
Drizzle saffron milk on top, seal the pot, and cook on low heat for 20â€“25 minutes.
Fluff and serve hot with raita or salad.
title: Chicken Biriyani | Jakia Sultana Jerin | Weekend dish

reviews.description: Tasted amazing! Just like in Rome.

description: Chicken Biryani is a flavorful and aromatic South Asian rice dish made with layers of marinated chicken, basmati rice, and a blend of traditional spices. It's cooked with saffron or turmeric for color and aroma, often garnished with fried onions and fresh herbs. A festive and comforting one-pot meal.

ingredients.Saffron: a few strands soaked in 2 tbsp warm milk (optional)

steps: Start boiling pasta according to package instructions, drain and set aside once complete.
While your pasta is boiling, make the sauce. Heat your pan on high. Pour in your oil and ground beef/chicken.
Break up the beef/chicken into small chunks and fry in the oil until very well browned and foamy.
Then add seasonings and onions. Stirfry for a minute.
Then add  tomatoes. Press the tomatoes with your spatula to break them up into small pieces. Cook until all the water evaporat.
Add green bell peppers, stir-fry for a minute, then simmer with a cup of water for 15-20 minutes until veggies are soft. Add water as needed.
Once nice and fried, add in your cooked shell pasta and mix into the sauce very well, keeping your pot on low to heat the pasta back up a little.
Top with cheese and a sprinkle of chopped cilantro and serve hot, enjoy!
title: Deshi Style Pasta

reviews.description: Spicy and flavorful. Loved it with naan!

description: Deshi Style Pasta is a spicy, flavorful pasta dish made with ground beef, soft veggies, and rich deshi-style spices. The sauce is cooked down until dry and caramelized, giving it a bold, curry-like taste. Perfect for a savory snack or main meal.

steps: Heat oil in a wok.
Add garlic and ginger.
Add vegetables and stir-fry on high heat.
Add soy sauce and stir until well coated.
Serve hot.
title: Dhaba Chicken
description: A quick and healthy vegetable stir-fry with Asian flavors.

steps: Mix dry ingredients.
Whisk in milk and egg.
Pour batter on a hot griddle.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip.
Serve with syrup or fruit.
title: Loitta Shutki
description: Fluffy breakfast pancakes with syrup or fruit toppings.

steps: Chop romaine lettuce.
Toss with dressing.
Top with croutons and Parmesan.
Serve chilled.
title: Easy Sautted Vegetable
description: Crisp romaine with creamy Caesar dressing and croutons.

steps: Butter the bread slices.
Place cheese between slices.
Grill on pan until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot.
title: Beef Kala Bhuna

steps: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla.
Dip bread slices into the mixture.
Fry in butter until golden on both sides.
Serve with syrup or fruits.
title: Roshogulla
description: Sweet and golden French toast served with syrup.

steps: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla.
Dip bread slices into the mixture.
Fry in butter until golden on both sides.
Serve with syrup or fruits.
title: Chitoi Pitha
description: Sweet and golden French toast served with syrup.

steps: Cook chopped tomatoes, onion, and garlic.
Add broth and simmer.
Blend until smooth.
Stir in cream, salt, and pepper.
Serve warm.
title: Tomato Soup
description: Smooth and tangy tomato soup perfect for cold days.
